titleStmt.title: The three sisters teares Shed at the late solemne funerals of the royall deceased Henry, Prince of Wales, &c. R.N. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Niccols, Richard, 1584-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Richard Redmer, and are to be sould at his shop neere the west dore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: A1r is a mourning page, printed solid black, with the Prince's crest, motto, and initials in center; A1v and A4r,v are mourning pages.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
